verses.roman:
prabhure govinda kahe,--"raghunātha 'prasāda' nā laya
rātrye siṁha-dvāre khāḍā hañā māgi' khāya"

synonyms: prabhure—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; govinda kahe—Govinda said; raghunātha—Raghunātha dāsa; prasāda nā laya—does not take prasāda; rātrye—at night; siṁha-dvāre—at the Siṁha-dvāra gate; khāḍā hañā—standing; māgi'-begging; khāya—he eats.
translation: Govinda said to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, "Raghunātha dāsa no longer takes prasāda here. Now he stands at the Siṁha-dvāra, where he begs some alms to eat."
